name: Sir Bruce Forsyth
occupation: Television presenter, actor, comedian, singer, dancer, entertainer, screenwriter
accessdate: 26 August 2014   Forsyth came to national attention from the mid-1950s through the ITV series ''Sunday Night at the London Palladium''. Since then he has hosted series such as ''The Generation Game'', ''Play Your Cards Right'', ''The Price Is Right (UK game show)
